name: places/ChIJrViEM4FZwokR81etLl343Vo
formattedAddress: 405 Central Park W, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 405 Central Park W, New York, NY 10025, USA

editorialSummary.text: Pickup location for a business that curates grab-&-go picnics with thoughtfully sourced items.

originalText.text:
I bought the Gold Experience for two people from 6-8PM and because of unforeseen circumstances (crane caught on fire and crashed into a building causing major traffic) my partner and I arrived at 7:30 PM! We only had 30 minutes to enjoy the picnic, which was such a bummer

but I was communicated with properly by the employees through email as well as text, and my picnic was (without asking!) extended till 8:45 PM. Giving us an hour and 15 minutes to enjoy ourselves.

I was so thankful and glad, we watched the sunset and everything was right. An hour was genuinely MORE than enough to enjoy everything from the champagne to the incredible sandwiches and brownies they made. After that, we walked away from the picnic and strolled through Central Park. Awesome experience and customer service and staff and food. Expensive, but if you want a magical moment, well worth it.

originalText.text: Happened to find this gem while walking the park last Friday and fell in love! Great food, adorable items but the best part was the staff. They were so sweet, helpful and friendly. I wish I had gotten their names, they were delightful. The kids picnic lunch was such a clever idea. The larger picnic options are well thought out, good value too,  but we enjoyed it simply for sandwiches and snacks. Will most definitely be back to do a full picnic this spring. DELICIOUS cake btw!

text.text: Happened to find this gem while walking the park last Friday and fell in love! Great food, adorable items but the best part was the staff. They were so sweet, helpful and friendly. I wish I had gotten their names, they were delightful. The kids picnic lunch was such a clever idea. The larger picnic options are well thought out, good value too,  but we enjoyed it simply for sandwiches and snacks. Will most definitely be back to do a full picnic this spring. DELICIOUS cake btw!

originalText.text: Wow! Jennifer and Wendy made my Husband's 50th Birthday absolutely perfect. Although the NYC flooding hindered us from having our picnic in the park, they were able to bring the picnic food to a new location and set up. The sandwiches were so good. Everything was SO GOOD and fresh. Lots of love put into the food. Since we have a credit we are looking forward to our next trip to NYC to book another picnic. I highly recommend this company. Its not only something different and something everyone would remember but the details and customer friendly staff make it 5+ stars

originalText.text: I won a free basket from them through Fever and it was so lovely! It included a tote bag and picnic blanket and the food was great. Not sure I would have paid the price of the same experience out of pocket, but the service was great.

text.text: I won a free basket from them through Fever and it was so lovely! It included a tote bag and picnic blanket and the food was great. Not sure I would have paid the price of the same experience out of pocket, but the service was great.

originalText.text:
Usually I have a good experience. But,
yesterday I went to perfect picnic to purchase some pastries. I used my debit card to pay and usually leave a cash tip. When I checked my digital receipt, I realized that the young man who served me added a 22% tip to my card without my permission. That is such a violation. I will not be returning.
Please check your receipts before leaving.

You did email me privately.
Not sure why this warrants a 2nd email.
I never received a refund. A refund isn’t necessary.
